trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration" /> namespace contains classes that provide configuration for Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) applications that use the WS-Federation protocol.
trans-unit.target: O namespace <see cref="N:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration" /> contém classes que fornecem a configuração para aplicativos WIF (Windows Identity Foundation) que usam o protocolo Web Services Federation.

trans-unit.source: The classes in this namespace represent settings under the [<system.identityModel.services>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/system-identitymodel-services.md) element.
trans-unit.target: As classes neste namespace representam as configurações no elemento [<system.identityModel.services>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/system-identitymodel-services.md).

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.IdentityModel.Services" /> namespace also contains some of the classes that are used to configure WS-Federation.
trans-unit.target: O namespace <see cref="N:System.IdentityModel.Services" /> também contém algumas das classes que são usadas para configurar a Web Services Federation.

trans-unit.source: Classes that configure other service and application settings, such as security token handlers, are contained primarily in the <see cref="N:System.IdentityModel.Configuration" /> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Classes que definem outras configurações de serviço e aplicativo, como manipuladores de token de segurança, estão contidas principalmente no namespace <see cref="N:System.IdentityModel.Configuration" />.

trans-unit.source: These settings appear under the [<identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md) element in a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Essas configurações aparecem sob o elemento [<identityConfiguration>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/identityconfiguration.md) em um arquivo de configuração.
